overview: Mark Cooper is the CMO and Co-founder of Offerpop and brings nearly 20 years of experience in management, marketing and business development. Most recently, Mark was CEO of Frontal, an open source language for rich media. Before that, Mark was the head of Product Marketing at ESPN for their mobile business. He was also VP of Marketing at IAG Research (acquired by Nielsen) and VP of Sales & Marketing at Sitebridge (acquired by eGain). Earlier in his career, Mark worked in marketing at Apple and Nike, and was an Account Manager at Leo Burnett Hong Kong. Mark holds a BA in History and a BA in International Economics from Brown University.
